#summary How to help and support SayMyName.
#labels Featured
If you want to help make SayMyName even better, consider doing some of these things:

= Translate =
Translate SayMyName into other languages and make the descriptions of the various settings in the app better.
See [http://code.google.com/p/roadtoadc/wiki/TranslateMe this page.]

= Donate =
You can donate using the Android Market (buy "SayMyName Donate") or using PayPal.
See [http://code.google.com/p/roadtoadc/wiki/Donate this page.]

= Code =
If you know how, you can add some of the wanted and missing features.
See [http://code.google.com/p/roadtoadc/wiki/FeatureWishlist this page.]

*Last but not least:* (it's the best thing you can do!)
= Give me feedback =
Send me a mail, or leave a comment with things you like and things you don't like.

Thanks

Tom
